reviews.review_msg: The best English professor at SFU! She is always willing to help her students and genuinely wants to see them succeed. She is passionate about the material that she teaches, and she creates a safe learning environment for all students. She provides detailed feedback on all your assignments, so you know how to improve.

She really wants you to participate and the more you participate the more you start enjoying the course. Davis is very caring and gives amazing feedback. There are online discussions along with group discussions but because the class is smaller it's very enjoyable. I would take her again as she's open to differing opinions and encourages it!

Unprofessional, never on time. Classes were ENTIRELY student led (all discussions).  Michelle rarely lectured and even if she did, her comments were empty and vague. Absolutely ruined Jane Austen for me.  Worst English prof I've ever had.
